creator: Mobiteach LLC
descriptionHtml:
Ukrainian for beginners. That’s your fast start!

Would you like to learn Ukrainian words easily and quickly?
Would you like to boost your Ukrainian language learning free of charge?
Are you looking for a good application to start learning Ukrainian?
Our Ukrainian learning app was developed for those, who want to get basic knowledge of conversational Ukrainian quickly and free of charge! Ukrainian verbs and more!
The content is being developed by leading specialists in language training! Quality is here!
Study Ukrainian words in the application Ukrainian for beginners. Studying Ukrainian has never been so easy and simple! You won’t need a Ukrainian dictionary anymore!

Do you need a certain topic for studying? You can learn to speak Ukrainian and choose among the most important topics to learn Ukrainian anytime, anyplace with our vocabulary trainer:
Family and friends.
Life.
Parts of body.
Describing people.
Clothes.
Numbers.
Colours
Calendar and time.
Holidays.
Emotions.
Shoes and accessories.
Hobbies and interests.
Sport.
School.
Education.
Professions.
Computer.
The world around us.
Home.
Prepositions and adverbs.
Bedroom.
Bathroom.
Kitchen.
Household chores.
Cooking.
Vegetables.
Fruit and berries.
Food and drinks.
Weather.
City and country.
Village.
Transport.
Shopping.
Free time.
Books and art.
Music.
Cinema and theatre.
Media.
Travelling.
Nature and environment.
Politics.
Health.
Toys.

Are you ready to spend 5-20 minutes a day on Ukrainian lessons? Regularity is very important!
Lesson content:
Learn to speak Ukrainian You can learn words and overcome language barrier.
Learn to understand. Identify the object, learn Ukrainian by cards.
Learn how to read in Ukrainian Simply read all the options and choose words which corresponds to the picture. Ukrainian language learning made simple!
And the most difficult is spelling. Make a word from the letters. Practice Ukrainian by cards!

How important is it for you to see your success? We have a report about your achievements!
success in learning Ukrainian words
success in pronunciation of Ukrainian words
success in spelling of Ukrainian words

Tell your friends about your progress:
share the link on Facebook/Twitter/Linkedin or any other social network.

SUPPORT AND FEEDBACK
If you have any questions, please contact us on support@mobiteach.ltd.
We will be happy to answer all your questions.

Thank you for choosing application Ukrainian for Beginners! Learn languages for free with our apps!

Наше приложение для изучения украинского языка было разработано для тех, кто хочет быстро и бесплатно учить базовый украинский! Преодолейте языковой барьер - Украина поймет вас!

Изучайте украинские слова в приложении украинский для начинающих. Изучение украинского еще никогда не было таким легким и простым. Начните учить украинские слова и фразы сегодня!

Вам нужна лексика? Выберите одну из тем, чтобы учить слова в любое время и в любом месте с помощью нашего словарного тренажера. Вам больше не понадобится украинский разговорник!

Семья и друзья.
Жизнь.

Одежда.
Числа.
Цвета

Игрушки.


Вы готовы тратить 5-20 минут в день на уроки украинского языка? Регулярность очень важна!
Содержание урока:

Научитесь говорить Вы сможете улучшить свое украинское произношение и преодолеть языковой барьер.
Научитесь понимать.Вы сможете учить украинские слова с помощью карточек - все части речи, а не только украинские глаголы!
Научитесь читать на украинском и переводить на украинский язык.. Просто прочитайте все варианты слов и выберите тот, который соответствует картинке. Пополните свой словарный запас!
И самое сложное — орфография!. Составьте слово из букв. Практикуйте украинский по карточкам!

Насколько важно для вас видеть свой успех? У нас есть отчет о ваших достижениях!

descriptionHtml:
Learn Ukrainian language for beginners. That’s your fast start!

Would you like to learn Ukrainian words easily and quickly?
Would you like to boost your Ukrainian language learning free of charge?
Are you looking for a good application to start learning Ukrainian?
Our Ukrainian learning app was developed for those, who want to get basic knowledge of conversational Ukrainian quickly and free of charge! Ukrainian verbs and more!
The content is being developed by leading specialists in language training! Quality is here!
Study Ukrainian words in the application Ukrainian for beginners. Studying Ukrainian has never been so easy and simple! You won’t need a Ukrainian dictionary anymore!

Do you need a certain topic for studying? You can learn to speak Ukrainian and choose among the most important topics to learn Ukrainian anytime, anyplace with our vocabulary trainer:
Family and friends.
Life.

Learn to speak Ukrainian You can learn words and overcome language barrier.
Learn to understand. Identify the object, learn Ukrainian by cards.
Learn how to read in Ukrainian Simply read all the options and choose words which corresponds to the picture. Ukrainian language learning made simple!
And the most difficult is spelling. Make a word from the letters. Practice Ukrainian by cards!

Would you like to boost your Ukrainian language learning free of charge?
Are you looking for a good application to start learning Ukrainian?
Our Ukrainian learning app was developed for those, who want to get basic knowledge of conversational Ukrainian quickly and free of charge! Ukrainian verbs and more!
The content is being developed by leading specialists in language training! Quality is here!
Study Ukrainian words in the application Ukrainian for beginners. Studying Ukrainian has never been so easy and simple! You won’t need a Ukrainian dictionary anymore!

Are you ready to spend 5-20 minutes a day on Ukrainian lessons? Regularity is very important!
Lesson content:
Learn to speak Ukrainian You can learn words and overcome language barrier.
Learn to understand. Identify the object, learn Ukrainian by cards.
Learn how to read in Ukrainian Simply read all the options and choose words which corresponds to the picture. Ukrainian language learning made simple!
And the most difficult is spelling. Make a word from the letters. Practice Ukrainian by cards!

How important is it for you to see your success? We have a report about your achievements!
